europeana:record.dc:title: Trachycystis montissalinarum spec. nov., a new charopid from the Soutpansberg complex in the Northern Province, South Africa (Mollusca: Gastropoda Pulmonata: Charopidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Bruggen, van A.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Mollusca
Gastropoda
Pulmonata
Charopidae
Trachycystis
South Africa
taxonomy
europeana:record.dc:description: A new species of Trachycystis s.l. (Charopidae) from the Hanglip Forest in the Soutpansberg complex in the Northern Province of South Africa is described. Absence of anatomical data precludes more precise classification. The shell is characterized by a spirally sculpted apex and a somewhat irregular flange-like costulation on the later whorls.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Trachycystis montissalinarum spec. nov., a new charopid from the Soutpansberg complex in the Northern Province, South Africa (Mollusca: Gastropoda Pulmonata: Charopidae) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 76, 1-16)
